item.title: Writing output to your own log file
item.description: Not able to trace issue in production environment? There are many ways to do so, XDEBUG is one of preferred way to debug php website remotely. However, installing and configuring it can be a lengthy process, Specially when web hosting is not in your control. In order to fix the issue in one of my clientâ€™s website, I came up with a solution where I can output desired part of code in my own log file.
